paramInformation.label: Parameter 10
paramInformation.description: Whether to enable over temperature protection. when temperature achieves the set value, the relay output will be forced to off

paramInformation.label: Parameter 11
paramInformation.description: Temperature change report threshold, report to gateway when change value is lower or higher than the threshold

paramInformation.label: Parameter 12
paramInformation.description: Time interval for periodical temperature report, unit is s

paramInformation.label: Parameter 13
paramInformation.description: Power change absolute threshold, unit is w, report when power change value lower or higher than the threshold

paramInformation.label: Parameter 14
paramInformation.description: Voltage change absolute threshold, unit is v, report when voltage change value lower or higher than the threshold

paramInformation.label: Parameter 15
paramInformation.description: Current change absolute threshold, unit is 0.1a, report when current change value lower or higher than the threshold

paramInformation.label: Parameter 18
paramInformation.description: Device state after a power reset

options.label: Switch mode: 00， turn off relay ；thermostat mode:00，hvac off mode
Switch mode: 01， turn on relay ；thermostat mode:01，hvac heat mode
Switch mode: 02，save relay state before power reset ；thermostat mode:02，save hvac state before power reset

paramInformation.label: Parameter 19
paramInformation.description: Enable/disable to send switch_binary_report to the lifeline when the plug (under switch mode) state changes, reset power of the plug and factory reset the the plug

paramInformation.label: Parameter 20
paramInformation.description: Enable/disable current protection threshold function, for instance, set the value as 15, then the over current protection will be triggered at 15.2a

paramInformation.label: Parameter 8
paramInformation.description: When configured as thermostat mode: if thermostat setpoint or mode changes, whether to report actively

paramInformation.label: Parameter 9
paramInformation.description: Set a threshold,unit is 0.1 celsius degree

metadata.inclusion: Triple press the action button on the smart plug, it will set the plug into inclusion mode.The LED indicator will flash a white LED fast then stay solid white for 3 seconds to indicate successful inclusion. If there is no Z-Wave network available, the LED indicator will flash white fast for 30 seconds and the plug will quit inclusion mode automatically
metadata.exclusion:
Triple press the action button, the smart plug will be set to exclusion mode, the LED indicator will flash a
white LED fast and then flash white slowly for 3 times to indicate successful exclusion. If exclusion fails, the
LED indicator will flash fast for 30 seconds and the plug will quit exclusion mode automatically
metadata.reset:
Press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds, LED indicator stays solid white for 3s to indicate
successful factory reset, release action button, the smart plug will restart automatically
